function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor indoor climate leading to health issues","Impact":"Reduced productivity and increased healthcare costs","Mitigation":"Improving indoor climate through temperature control and ventilation","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers","People":"Occupants of the office space","Owner":"Property owners, building sector professionals"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness of economic impact of indoor climate","Impact":"Missed opportunities for cost savings and productivity gains","Mitigation":"Education and awareness initiatives on the economic value of indoor climate","Technologies":"Data analytics for measuring indoor climate effects","People":"Users of office space, property owners, building sector professionals","Owner":"Building sector professionals, researchers"},{"Description":"Inaccurate economic calculations for investments and operations","Impact":"Financial losses and inefficient resource allocation","Mitigation":"Incorporating economic value of indoor climate into cost-benefit analysis","Technologies":"Economic modeling and simulation tools","People":"Investors, property owners, building sector professionals","Owner":"Investors, building sector professionals"}]}
